attributes.action: Ban charges increasing during fixed-term mobile contracts
attributes.additional_details: We are in the middle of a cost of living crisis and many mobile firms have increased prices between 15-18%. When a contract is signed at a certain price that's the price we should pay for the length of the contract.
attributes.background: Make it so when we sign a fixed-term contract at a certain price it stays at that price, and mobile providers cannot include terms and conditions that allow for prices to be increased during the contract.

departments.name: Department for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport
